name: MistoBox
overview:
MistoBox is redefining the coffee discovery and purchase process by offering coffee drinkers a unique way to sample, shop, and learn about coffees from the country’s most exceptional artisan coffee roasters.

MistoBox offers a coffee subscription that introduces coffee drinkers to four coffees every month. From crop to cup, MistoBox is curating an experience that demystifies excellent coffee.

Behind the scenes, the MistoBox team tastes and evaluates more than 40 coffees and hand-selects only four of the very best coffees every month. Each box contains educational content that introduces subscribers to each coffee, the featured roasters, and brewing tips. MistoBox provides an online shop that allows members to purchase the coffees they have sampled and brewing equipment for a variety of brewing methods.

The MistoBox team is a passionate group that dreams big, tests and implements innovative ideas, and strives to revolutionize the coffee market.
